title: Seeming
content:
up to 4 members of your adventuring party. Level: Lvl 5 spell School: Illusion School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: N/A

How to Acquire Seeming

Seeming can be acquired by the following classes: Bard, Wizard, Sorcerer Warlock (Archfey) Seeming can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Bard, Wizard, Sorcerer Warlock (Archfey)

Seeming Tips & Notes

Has the same uses as Disguise Self. To dispel Seeming, use the Dispel Disguise ability in the Common t
